title: Collaboration is key in the realm of cooperative flat sharing
body: Sharing your home on Fairbnb should be a rewarding experience. By initiating projects in your neighborood, you could turn your idea into a business! Your friends could participate. Got a good idea? Involve your friends by inviting them to fund your project!

title: Fairbnb Is Testing its Host Model in Berlin
body: A new host model, in which 5% of hosts' revenues are available to hosts to either initiate or fund others' project is being tested in Berlin. The first results are encouraging, seeing a rise of 15% of new projects coming from hosts. Also, projects get funded more rapidly
